comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: Interesting and strange contraption. You had to climb the ladder and hold onto the railing to change the plates that hang on hooks for platforms and train names, or to rotate the "Direction" by the knobs at the left, and to move the clock hands. Presumably the cupboards are to store number and name plates. It can only display trains for a two-hour period which would mean alot of climbing. No wonder they replaced it fairly quickly.
